items.name: Gale Hope
enchantMods: Adds 5 Passive Skills
1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 10% increased Damage while affected by a Herald
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Cold Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: 5% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
1 Added Passive Skill is Empowered Envoy
1 Added Passive Skill is Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Glorious Vanity
explicitMods:
Bathed in the blood of 6288 sacrificed in the name of Doryani
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the pinnacle of civilisation, but that height toppled their empire.

items.name: Dragon Essence
enchantMods: Adds 2 Passive Skills
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 15% increased Armour
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2% to Fire Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: 4% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
1 Added Passive Skill is Enduring Composure
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Nine Lives if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Grand Spectrum
explicitMods: +7% to all Elemental Resistances per Grand Spectrum
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Skin like steel tempered by bright flames.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Bramble Spark

1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Nine Lives if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Apocalypse Sliver
enchantMods: Adds 4 Passive Skills
1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 10% increased Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Fire Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Inspired Oppression
1 Added Passive Skill is Overshock
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Grand Spectrum
explicitMods: +1 to Minimum Power Charges per Grand Spectrum
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Calamitous Visions
explicitMods: Adds Lone Messenger
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: "Try as I might, I could not escape it.
When I closed my eyes, I saw only death.
Each breath tainted with the scent of seared and smouldering flesh,
And each sound tangled with pleas for mercy."

18.name: Lone Messenger
stats:
You can only have one Herald
50% more Effect of Herald Buffs on you
100% more Damage with Hits from Herald Skills
50% more Damage Over Time with Herald Skills
Minions from Herald Skills deal 25% more Damage
Your Aura Skills are Disabled
flavourText: Some tasks are too important to entrust to others.
